patterns: How long does a refund take?
responses: Refunds take 2-4 business days.

patterns: Enlighten me with your sense of humor
responses: Why did the hipster burn his mouth? He drank the coffee before it was cool.
What did the buffalo say when his son left for college? Bison.
What did one snowman say to the other? 'Hey, do you smell carrots?'
One joke coming up! What is a sea monster's favorite snack? Ships and dips.

patterns: Who do I call in case of emergency?
responses: For emergencies, please dial emergency services (e.g., 911) or contact local authorities.
In case of emergencies during your travel, please contact the nearest emergency services or your travel assistance provider.
